entry.title: What's Maching Learning?
entry.content:
贴上了黄博的github笔记：

贴上黄博的github笔记：

  5. 数据科学笔记：github：https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//github.com/fengdu78/Data-Science-Notes

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
搞了**的整整两天，我的个人blog终于能在云端访问了^^^^

After two fucking days, Lao Tzu’s personal blog is finally online, fuck
